install.name: Slick RSS
install.author: David Thomas
install.description: Parse and Display RSS Feed News with DHTML Teaser Tooltip. Support and feature request enquiries to the support forum at http://joomla.daveslist.co.nz/forum . If this module helps you out, please give feedback at the Slick RSS extension page: http://tinyurl.com/yu76t6

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (div.module), this allows individual module styling

param.name: rsscache
param.label: RSS Cache time
param.description: Set the cache time for the RSS feed (seconds)

param.name: rssurl
param.label: RSS URL
param.description: Enter the URL of a RSS feed. e.g: http://digg.com/rss/indexnews.xml

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for each news feed

param.name: rssimage
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show the image associated with each news feed

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display for each RSS feed

param.name: rssitemtitle_words
param.label: Item Title Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc
param.label: Item Description Text
param.description: Show description text for each RSS item in the main list.

param.name: rssitemdesc_words
param.label: Item Description Word Count
param.description: Maximum number of words to display for each RSS item description. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc_images
param.label: Item Description Text Images
param.description: Allow images in the item description text in the main list.

param.name: link_target
param.label: RSS Feed Link Target
param.description: Open RSS feed links in this window or a new window?

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Tooltip Settings
param.description: The settings below are related to the mouseover tooltip

param.name: enable_tooltip
param.label: Enable Tooltip
param.description: Show item description in mouseover tooltip? e.g this one!

param.name: t_word_count_title
param.label: Tooltip Title Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text in the tooltip. 0 will show all the text

param.name: t_word_count_desc
param.label: Tooltip Description Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item description text in the tooltip. 0 will show all the text

param.name: tooltip_desc_images
param.label: Tooltip Description Text Images
param.description: Allow images in the tooltip description text
